sharpness_din_st(signal, fs, weighting='din', field_type='free')[source]ïƒ
Acoustic sharpness calculation according to different methods:

Aures, Von Bismarck, DIN 45692, Fastl

Parameters:ïƒ

signal: numpy.array

A time signal in [Pa], dim (nperseg, nseg)
